description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is planning to carry out an expansion of the chancery at the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai. The chancery is located at Jumeirah Emirates Towers, Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The expansion will accommodate for additional workstations, washroom facilities, meeting room, multiple closed offices, print area, and kitchenette in a total floor area of approximately 220 square meters.

full_summary:
# Notice of Invitation to Tender: Architectural & Engineering Services for Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates

**Title:** Architectural & Engineering Services - Chancery Expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai

## **Notice Details:**
- **Reference Number:** 23-223883
- **Publication Date:** 04 November 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** 29 November 2022, 14:00:00
- **Contracting Entity Name:** Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
- **Contact Information:** Hygaard, Brent, [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca), 343-573-5242

## **Overview**
The Government of Canada invites qualified firms to submit proposals for architectural and engineering services for the expansion of the Consulate General of Canada to the United Arab Emirates, in Dubai. This project aims to provide additional space for staff, meeting rooms, and facilities while maintaining the existing operations of the chancery.

## **Project Objective**
The chancery expansion involves designing and constructing an additional floor with a total area of approximately 220 square meters. This includes various spaces such as office areas, meeting rooms, washroom facilities, print area, and kitchenette.

## **Scope of Work**
The Successfully selected firm will be required to provide architectural and engineering services including:

* Design services (Schematic Design, Design Development, and Construction Contract Administration)
* Permit applications and submissions
* Tender preparation and evaluation
* Construction contract administration, including supervision of works

## **Eligibility**
This RFP is open to all Canadian and international firms that specialize in architectural and engineering services. Companies that bid on this project must demonstrate the ability to perform the required services.

## **Tender Documents**
Tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca platform. Interested firms can access the RFP document by clicking on the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/752cdf0e1469cda4495c5e23646eb71c/npp_23-223883.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/752cdf0e1469cda4495c5e23646eb71c/npp_23-223883.pdf)
